dcterms:description: A dataset constructed for training and evaluating ARShadowGAN, consisting of 3,000 quintuples of images. Each quintuple includes synthetic AR images without virtual object shadows, corresponding images with shadows, virtual object masks, real-world shadow matting, and occluder masks.
dcterms:title: Shadow-AR dataset
